short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your New Tab with practical widgets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The browser's new tab is the most visited place on your computer. It is a crime to keep it useless!

MirachTab transforms Chrome's new tab page into a fully customizable dashboard. Key features:

• Custom new tab background image

• Switching between multiple boards

• Widgets that allow you to repeat the functionality of the default new tab page

• Quick notes, Translate, To-do list, Calendar, World time, Weather

• Many more widgets to come - stay tuned!

• No excessive permissions required - you define the balance between security and functionality

• Share your dashboard setup with others by saving it as a file

If you are a developer and would like to create your own widget - please contact alex@mirachapps.com.
